message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to acquire a valuable product that I believe will be of great benefit to you.  My asking price is $900,000. This price represents a significant opportunity for you, as the product is worth $800,000 to you. I understand this is a substantial investment, but I'm confident the value you'll gain from this product will far outweigh the cost.  Please consider this offer carefully. I'm available to answer any questions you may have.
